Social Media Strategy

The Social Media Strategy Course is an academic program designed to equip students with skills in digital communication, marketing, and strategic content management across various social media platforms.  The course bridges academic theory with practical industry skills in digital communication, preparing students to: Navigate complex social media landscapes, Create data-driven content strategies, Understand platform-specific dynamics, Develop professional digital communication competencies

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Evaluate a range of social media platforms and their suitability to reach identified target audiences (Knowledge and Understanding, Learning, Problem Solving)

+  Develop a social media strategy appropriate to meet business objectives (Application)

+  Analyse digital content to compare and contrast effectiveness of social media tools (Analysis and Communication)
